class.name: GFComponent
class.brief_description: A reference to a Glecs component from a [GFWorld] that is attatached to an entity.

method.name: get_member
method.description: Returns the value of a component's member

method.name: get_source_entity
method.description: Returns a [GFEntity] reference to the entity this component's data is from.

method.name: get_source_id
method.description: Returns the ID of the entity that this component's data is from.

method.name: set_member
method.description: Sets the value of a component's member
